title: God of War Rumors Bring PS5's Fall Lineup Into Focus
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Tina Amini, Sam Claiborn, and Justin Davis -- are discussing God of War Ragnarok, the Last of Us Part 1 remake, TMNT: Shredder's Revenge, Marvel's Midnight Suns, Aliens Dark Descent, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield)
